DOC.brief_summary: The objective study measure change blood value administration amino acid base erythropoietin stimulating system .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-label Trial Determine Increased Red Blood Cell Production Subjects With Anemia Chronic Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . M/F patient 18 year old , nonpregnant/lactating 2 . Hemoglobin < 10 female , < 11 male 3 . Ferritin > upper limit normal lab indicative chronic anemia 4 . Anemia chronic disease 5 . Crt . < 3.0 1 . Currently take amino acid formulation . 2 . Pregnant unwilling use adequate birth control duration study . 3 . Excessive alcohol illicit drug use . 4 . Unwilling unable sign inform consent . 5 . Myocardial infarction within last 6 month . 6 . Patients ever take currently take erythropoietin medication . 7 . Iron deficiency ( add criterion ) . 8 . On dialysis . 9 . Malignancy nonmelanoma skin cancer within last 5 year . If malignancy , must documentation recurrence least 5 year . 10 . Liver cirrhosis ( add criterion ) .
